Title: Relates to permitting registration and party enrollment within 10 days of an election; repealer
Summary: Permits voter registration and party enrollment, and change of party enrollment within 10 days of a primary, general, or special election.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to registering to vote and enrolling in a party within 10 days of a primary, general or special election; and to repeal subdivision 3 of section 5-304 of the election law relating thereto
